required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Safety and Pharmacokinetic Study of AG-881 in Healthy Male Participants Following Administration of a Single Oral Dose of [14C] AG-881 and Concomitant Intravenous Microdose of [13C315N3] AG-881
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-label Study to Evaluate the Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, and Excretion, and to Assess the Absolute Bioavailability of AG-881 in Healthy Male Subjects Following Administration of a Single Oral Dose of [14C] AG-881 and Concomitant Intravenous Microdose of [13C315N3] AG-881

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this Phase I, open-label study is to evaluate the absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion, absolute bioavailability, and to characterize the metabolites of AG-881 in healthy male participants following administration of a single oral dose of [14C] AG-881 and a concomitant intravenous microdose of [13C315N3] AG-881.

primary_outcome.measure: Amount of AG-881 Excreted in Urine (Aeu)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Cumulative Aeu (Cum Aeu) of AG-881
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of AG-881 excreted in Urine and Feces (feu and fef, Respectively)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Cumulative Percentage of AG-881 Excreted in Urine (Cum feu)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Cumulative Percentage of AG-881 Excreted in Feces (Cum fef)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Renal Clearance (CLR) of AG-881
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Renal Clearance Expressed as a Percentage of Total Clearance (CLR/CL) of AG-881
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Total Radioactivity in Total Excreta Calculated as Cumulative Percentage of AG-881 Excreted in Urine and Feces (Cum fe)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve from Time Zero to the Last Measurable Concentration (AUC0-last) of AG-881
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve from Time Zero to 72 hours (AUC0-72) of AG-881
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hours

primary_outcome.measure: Partial Area Under the Concentration-time Curve from Time Zero to Common Time Point (AUC0-t) of AG-881
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve from Time Zero to Infinity (AUC0-∞) of AG-881 Calculated Using the Observed Value of the Last Quantifiable Concentration
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of AG-881
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Time to Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax) of AG-881
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Terminal Elimination Half-life (t½) of AG-881
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-∞ or AUC0-t of AG-881 in Plasma/AUC0-∞ or AUC0-t of Total Radioactivity in Plasma (AUC Plasma AG-881/Total Radioactivity Ratio)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-∞ of Total Radioactivity in Whole Blood to AUC0-∞ of Total Radioactivity in Plasma (AUC Blood/Plasma Ratio), Calculated Using the Observed Value of the Last Quantifiable Concentration
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Total Clearance of AG-881 Following Intravenous (IV) Administration (CL)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Clearance Following Oral Administration of AG-881 (CL/F)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution of AG-881 at Steady-state Following IV Administration (Vss)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Volume of Distribution During the Terminal Phase Following Oral Administration of AG-881 (Vz/F)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Absolute bioavailability (F) for AG-881 Calculated as the Ratio of Dose-normalized AUC0-∞ of Oral/Intravenous Dosing
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Metabolic Profiles of AG-881 in Plasma, Urine, and Feces, When Possible
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Structures of AG-881 Metabolites in Plasma, Urine, and, Where Possible, Feces
primary_outcome.time_frame: At multiple time points daily from Day -1 to Day 14; then at 24-hour intervals until discharge (up to 29 days); then weekly up to approximately 8 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Adverse Events (AEs), Graded by Severity
secondary_outcome.description: AEs will be graded according to the National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (NCI CTCAE; Version 4.03)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Laboratory Abnormalities
secondary_outcome.description: Laboratory assessments will include parameters assessing clinical chemistry, hematology, coagulation, urinalysis, and serology.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Abnormalities in 12-lead Electrocardiogram (ECG)
Percentage of Participants with Abnormalities in Vital Signs Measurements
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs will include supine blood pressure, supine pulse rate, and oral body temperature.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Abnormalities in Physical Examinations

arm_group.description: On Day 1, after fasting for 10 hours participants, will receive an oral capsule of [14C]AG-881 followed 2 hours later by a single intravenous (IV) infusion of [13C315N3]AG-881.

intervention.description: Single oral dose of approximately 50 mg AG-881 (free form) containing approximately 100 microcuries (μCi) of [14C]AG-881.
Single IV microdose of approximately 100 μg.
